system.description: Lithe or willowy build with pointed ears and four fingers and toes. Elves have both the patience and the aloof disposition that comes with a long lifespan. They value the natural world highly.

overview.base: You are immune to mental effects. The effects of Mental Effect Immunity are maintained even if transformed.
You have no maximum lifespan. Your aging slows down with time and seems to asymptote at around 500 years old, when you appear to be in your mid 30s.
You pull an additional 5 stones from the Death Bag.
